comments:
I am running code from the HEAD and got this error when opening JIRA editor from the editor history. I guess task data was swiped out by recent serialVersionUID changes in CVS.

Not sure if this issue with the JIRA editor or AbstractRepositoryTaskEditor should be checking that editorInput.getTaskData() is not null or if abstract editor should be kicking task data refresh if it is null...

Rob, this also happens when I click the hyperlink at the top of the Task List.  We should fall back to saying there is no data as before, and that label should tell the user to hit the refresh button.
